articles.title: Building a Multi Target JavaScript SDK: Build Tooling
articles.description: An in-depth look at architecting a build system that compiles a single codebase into three distinct deployment targets, complete with automated CI/CD pipelines.

articles.title: Unlock Lightning-Fast Lottie Loads with IndexedDB Persistence
articles.description: How we tackled large Lottie animation loading challenges by moving from naive fetching to a robust, persistent caching solution using IndexedDB for 6.7MB animations.
